images.copyright: Polar bear mother with cubs in Wapusk National Park, Manitoba, Canada (© Andre Gilden/Minden Pictures)
images.title: A day for those who rule the north
images.caption: International Polar Bear Day
images.desc: Today we celebrate International Polar Bear Day to spotlight efforts that protect these charismatic but vulnerable animals. Perhaps no other creature is as emblematic of climate change as polar bears, the apex predator of the Arctic. As the planet warms, their fragile habitat shrinks.
images.bsTitle: A day for those who rule the north
